title: Patron Account Schema
description: Account schema for patron portal integration

id.description: The FOLIO id of the patron

totalCharges.description: A patron's total outstanding fines and charges

totalChargesCount.description: The total number of fines and charges for the patron

totalLoans.description: The total number of items loaned to the patron

totalHolds.description: The total number of requested items for the patron

charges.description: A list of the patron's charges and fines

holds.description: A list of the patron's item holds

loans.description: A list of the patron's item checked out items
